properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 3:01PM AKST until January 5 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities reduced to half a
mile.

* WHERE...Thompson Pass.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Visibilities will be limited
in falling and blowing snow.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Up to 3 inches of new snow expected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON AKST SUNDAY THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED THROUGH THOMPSON PASS
